static member KMeans : Microsoft.ML.ClusteringContext.ClusteringTrainers * Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Vector<single> * Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<single> * int * Action<Microsoft.ML.Trainers.KMeans.KMeansPlusPlusTrainer.Arguments> * Action<Microsoft.ML.Trainers.KMeans.KMeansPredictor> -> ValueTuple<Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Vector<single>, Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Key<uint32>>

Docs.param: The number of clusters to use for KMeans.

A delegate that is called every time the method is called on the instance created out of this. This delegate will receive the linear model that was trained. Note that this action cannot change the result in any way; it is only a way for the caller to be informed about what was learnt.
